content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-pointer-lock allow-scripts; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'; child-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline' ; worker-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'

name: Flappy Dunk
description: Flappy Dunk basketball game to play in browser
